mapper.insert: insert into t_duty (EMPLOYEE_ID, DUTY_MONTH, DUTY_WORK_TIME_FROM, DUTY_DATE) values (#{employeeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyMonth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dutyWorkTimeFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dutyDate,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select EMPLOYEE_ID, DUTY_MONTH, DUTY_WORK_TIME_FROM, DUTY_DATE from t_duty
